Thanks for the update Amanda... Maybe I should call my mom when Dr. Phil is
on, so that she ll be tied up on the phone and won t watch the show! Lesa ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the update Amanda... Maybe I should call my mom when Dr. Phil is
on, so that she'll be tied up on the phone and won't watch the show!

Lesa

-------Original Message-------

From: John and Amanda Slater
Date: 11/21/06 14:30:47
To: nashville unschoolers; unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com;
alwaysunschooled@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Fwd: [TNunschooling] Homeschooling/Unschooling
on Dr. Phil

I'm passing this on from the TNunschoolers list. I checked and it really is
on this Friday.

Amanda

Brandie <scrapdiva73@...> wrote: To: tricitiesfun@yahoogroups.com,
tnunschooling@yahoogroups.com
From: Brandie <scrapdiva73@...>
Date: Mon, 20 Nov 2006 12:35:55 -0800 (PST)
Subject: [TNunschooling] Homeschooling/Unschooling on Dr. Phil

I'm sharing this on behalf of Karen Taylor of CHN (California Homeschool
Network) -- I already got this all set to record on my dvr.

-----Original Message-----
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2006 8:35 AM
Subject: Dr. Phil takes on homeschooling

The Dr. Phil show will be airing what homeschoolers in California
think will be a very anti-homeschooling show this Friday. It was
originally scheduled to be aired a month ago, but it was moved to the
day after Thanksgiving. Some homeschoolers wrote in and complained
after the taping, and the date was rescheduled, perhaps because they
thought fewer people might be watching.

Several California Homeschool Network local contacts were invited to
be in the audience, and one of them wrote a detailed accounting that
others who were there agreed was an accurate description of the
experience. It was originally discussed on the CaliforniaHS Yahoo
list, and Annette Hall put it on her website, so others could easily
refer to it: http://localhs. com/scuttle/ 2006/10/great- school-debate. asp

Dr. Phil's website now has a promotional video clip of the show you
can watch to get an idea of how it's going to go: http://drphil. com/

Brandie

http://www.scrapgirls.com/store/manufacturer.php?id=15

The work of art which I do not make, none other will ever make. -Simone Weil
